recipe.title: Herby Black Rice Salad with Radishes and Ricotta Salata
ingredients: 2 tablespoons Sherry vinegar or red wine vinegar
2 ounces ricotta salata (salted dry ricotta), thinly sliced
instructions: Combine oil and vinegar in a small airtight container; cover, and shake well. Season with salt and pepper.

Salad and assembly: Combine rice and 1 3/4 cups water in a medium saucepan; season with salt. Bring to a boil on camp stove over high. Reduce heat, cover saucepan, and simmer until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, 45–50 minutes. Remove from heat, fluff rice, and let sit, covered, 10 minutes. Let cool. Just before serving, toss rice and radishes with dressing in a large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add ricotta salata, almonds, dill, and chives and toss.
